cast.overview: Mick Haller is a charismatic defense attorney who does business out of his Lincoln Continental sedan. Mick spends most of his time defending petty crooks and other bottom-feeders, so it comes as quite a surprise when he lands the case of a lifetime: defending a Beverly Hills playboy who is accused of attempted murder. However, what Mick initially thinks is an open-and-shut case with a big monetary reward develops into something more sinister.
cast.title: The Lincoln Lawyer

details.biography: Ron Kari is known for The Love Witch (2016), Revelation Road: The Beginning of the End (2013) and Deadline (2011).
details.name: Ron Kari
